thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com | 3 of 457
thread.title: Elease Juarez

author: Elease Juarez
title: Elease Juarez
text:
DriveTime's website is easy to navigate and displays great pictures of the cars. You can get approved in minutes and know exactly what your down payment will be anywhere from zero down and up. The website gives you all the tools to shop online and then set up an appointment to go test drive the cars you've picked and done your research on via DriveTime's website.
When I arrived at the DriveTime location Jennifer Ortega (a sales representative) was there to greet me and help. I was able to test drive the car I picked online and it looked even better than the pictures online. Jennifer made me fill welcomed she expedited my purchase with ease and experience. The time I was there was the shortest time I've spent in a car dealership ever.
